ygData.subject: RE: Bombastic Bellow [ was: Dueling?]
ygData.msgSnippet: Grats Gael! We saw ya ll coming in to HS about the time we weremaking our last round. Started going all the way through North then going through West once we
ygData.messageBody:
Grats Gael! We saw ya'll coming in to HS about the time we weremaking our
last round. Started going all the way through North then going through West
once we got the key and then back to North, etc. It was less boring than
sitting in either spot. We were on our last round when the ogre fell into
the hole that he'd carefully avoided the last 2 cycles. I think it was a
plot against me as the Procurator was finally up and we had just enough time
to get to him, until the ogre forgot about the rug.
I had put my foot down about no raids all weekend so I could get to 56.
Logged on Friday and everyone is screaming for help to do Trak again so we
went along. Bard bp dropped and I won the lotto. After that we rounded up
some exp minded folks and entertained Darkfox in HS. Our wiz put succor in
his harvest spell spot and accidently ported us to zonein twice. (The third
succor was intentional.)

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe, L56 at last!
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
